name: dead valley
description:
3 days before zombies raising evil... You are stucked in your farm. But you have to leave quickly.

You can kill zombies, use different weapons, analyze objects and house, take objecte and store them in your inventory. But the most important is you to use cars and avoid destruct them, due to 150 Km (miles) you have to drive less then  3 days when apocalypse will come. GTA based addictive game !

please donate for development !!
